name: discord-message-sender
description: Send messages to Obsidian from Discord.
author: okawak

scripts.dev:build: bun run wasm:build && bunx vite build --mode development
scripts.build: bun run wasm:build && bunx vite build --mode production && cpx manifest.json dist
scripts.clean: rimraf dist pkg parse_message/target main.js main.js.map *.wasm
